name: orbiter/satellite
description: Easy to use Event & Middleware Mini-Framework, powered by popular projects and PSR's

suggest.orbiter/satellite-di: SystemLaunch Event Handler, adds DI based on PHP-DI, implements PSR-11
suggest.orbiter/satellite-console: SystemLaunch Event Handler, adds CLI based on GetOpt
suggest.orbiter/satellite-route: SystemLaunch Event Handler, adds Routing Middleware and unified Route Store, implements PSR-7,17 and PSR-15 middlewares helper
suggest.orbiter/satellite-response: Middleware Pipe, Dispatcher and Emitter, compatible with PSR-7,15,17
suggest.orbiter/satellite-whoops: Nice Error Pages for Developers in CLI and Routes
